text: Kimora Lee Simmons (born May 4, 1975Russell's hip-hip birthday gift (April 26, 2004) People. Accessed 2008-02-19.) is an American fashion model. She is the former president and Creative Director for Phat Fashions.Kimora Lee Simmons and Baby Phat Parting Ways (August 20, 2010) E! Online. Accessed 2010-11-09. She was born in Brooklyn, New York. Simmons is half Japanese and half African American. ==References== == Other websites == *Kimora Lee Simmons Pictures Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Businesspeople from St. Louis, Missouri Category:1975 births Category:Living people
title: Kimora Lee Simmons
